subject: We have deposited  your funds
body:
We have deposited  your funds (10.5Milion USD) through
Western Union department after our final meeting Today
contact Western Union director Mr.   John
 
He will give you the instruction
how you will be
receiving $5000  each a day
send him your Full information to avoid wrong transfer such as,
 
Receiver's Name__
Address: __
Country: __
Phone Number: _
 
From Ministry of Finance.
your Funds Worths $10.5Milion USD
 
Mr. John
ONLY ON THIS EMAIL ADDRESS
(
officeservice231@gmail.com
)

subject: Re: We have deposited  your funds
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's exciting to hear about the funds! I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about this process? How does it work exactly with Western Union?

Also, you mentioned Mr. John - is he the person I should be in contact with regarding this matter? Could you tell me more about his role?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Debbie

subject: Attention, Dear funds beneficiary
body:
This Mr. John Bell from Western Union payment department, I have received
your email and well noted, This is your compensation funds , we have
concluded to pay you through Western Union and you will be receiving every
day $5000.00usd until you receive your total amount from This Western
Union,  Noted that before we can send your first payment of $5000 you will
pay for our transfer charge which cost You only $195 and once you pay the
$195 then you will immediately receive your first payment of $5000 ,

Here's the information needed from You.

Receiver's Name__

Address: __

Country: __

Phone Number: _
Your I'd copy__


I needed your urgent response

From Ministry of Finance.

your Funds Worths 5.5Milion USD


Mr. John

ONLY ON THIS EMAIL ADDRESS

(officeservice231@gmail.com)

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Hello Mr. John Bell,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Western Union. I'm quite excited about this opportunity! It's not every day that one gets an email like this.

I understand that there is a transfer charge involved, and I will be receiving payments daily until the total amount is received. That sounds very interesting!

Could you please provide more details about these daily payments? How much would each payment be? And how long would it take to receive the total amount?

Also, could you clarify what exactly the transfer charge covers? Is it a one-time fee or will there be additional charges in the future?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Debbie

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Hello Mr. John Bell,

Thank you for reaching out to me! It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity from Western Union. I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about how this process works? 

Also, I'm curious about the transfer charge. Is it a one-time fee or will there be additional charges in the future? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Debbie

subject: Attention, Dear fund beneficiary
body:
Attention, Dear fund beneficiary

Sorry for my late response, I am writing to inform you that there's no more
fee again after you send This transfer charge of $195 , This transfer
charge of $195 covered all the payment of $5000 per day, meanwhile I am
tell you The honest Truth that this transfer charge is only once not every
day, So This is all needed from and you will be receiving your daily
payment from this Western Union office until you receive your total amount,

Again this payment will only take 2hours to be available on your name each
day from Monday to Saturday without any further delay once you come up with
The transfer charge,

Try to reconfirm us your full information to avoid wrong transfer,

I needed your urgent response

From Ministry of Finance.
your Funds Worths 5.5Milion USD

Mr. John
ONLY ON THIS EMAIL ADDRESS
(officeservice231@gmail.com)

subject: Attention, What's going on,
body:
I am still waiting to hear from you, What's all this silent try to get back
to me because we are ready to start sending your payment
Thanks
Mr. John Bell

from this office, I am looking forward to hear from and to Know how will

payment

I needed your urgent response

body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really interested in what you're saying, but could you please explain a bit more about this payment? What is it for exactly? And why do I need to send a transfer charge?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Debbie

subject: Attention, Debbie
body:
Attention,

I received your email and I am here to answer your email, This Western
Union payment was instructed from the Government and This payment is your
compensation payment and the reason why you must pay for the transfer
charge is to sure that you be receiving This payment without any problem
after we send to your name to pick up, It's mandentry that you will pay for
the transfer charge and start picking up your daily payment from this
Western Union, There's no way you can receive This payment without paying
the transfer charge,And again noted that delay is very bad over this
transfer before you will lose your payment, So I want only your full trust
And understand because I do not want you to lose This payment,

Tell me exactly how will you going to send the transfer charge because it's
the only thing holding your payment

I needed your urgent response

From Ministry of Finance.

Mr. John
ONLY ON THIS EMAIL ADDRESS
(officeservice231@gmail.com)
